channel.title: Several people are talking
channel.description: Audio archive for reading club discussions at vernacular.ai

item.title: Day 2
item.description: A few improvements starting this week. We have a better recording device now. Also we will be putting up links to the books/resources…
item.content:encoded:
A few improvements starting this week. We have a better recording device now. Also we will be putting up links to the books/resources covered.

Resources

  • The Noonday Demon by Andrew Solomon
  • Blood, Sweat, and Pixels: The Triumphant, Turbulent Stories Behind How Video Games Are Made by Jason Schreier
  • A Mathematician's Apology by G.H. Hardy
  • Ultralearning by Scott H. Young

item.title: Day 1
item.description: We lost our recording for day 1. Sorry @vipul @deepankar @pravj :(
item.content:encoded: We lost our recording for day 1. Sorry @vipul @deepankar @pravj :(

item.title: Day 0
item.description: A hello world. We have been meaning to archive our internal reading club discussions. This is a pilot day for that. Since this our first…
item.content:encoded:
A hello world.

We have been meaning to archive our internal reading club discussions. This is a pilot day for that.

Since this our first time with recordings, you might find awkward silences and transitions and general lack of audio and projection quality.
